#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX INT_MAX
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define pl(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
ll powmod(ll a,ll b,ll c)
{
 ll res=1LL;
 while(b>0)
 {
  if(b&1)
  res=(res*a)%c;
  a=(a*a)%c;
  b/=2;
 }
 return res;
}
ll inverse(ll a)
{
if(a==0)
return 1LL;
else
return powmod(a,MOD-2,MOD);
}


char str1[511];
char str2[511];
int main(){
	int t;
	s(t);
	while(t--){
		ll n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1){
			pl(m);
			continue;
		}
		ll ans=powmod(m-2,n-2,MOD);
		ans*=m;
		ans%=MOD;
		ans*=(m-1);
		ans%=MOD;
		pl(ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
